column5: My son & I howled when we stopped by the Triumph boat display and saw this: http://www.triumphboats.com/modelvideos.cf...&videoid=29 Bubba Proof Test  Actually looks pretty decent....  Ted
THat was a wild ad thanks for sharingLOL!

i saw these boats too yesterday....nice looking boats....but i was surprised that they cant take alot of horsepower for the size of them boats........i guess the flex of the transom makes it not possible for big motors  otherwise very cool boats
